providerBio: Professional guitarist with 10+ years of teaching experience. Specialized in acoustic and classical guitar.
description: Acoustic guitar classes for complete beginners focusing on basic chords, rhythm, and song playing.
detailedDescription: This comprehensive course is designed for absolute beginners who want to learn guitar from scratch. You'll start with guitar anatomy, tuning, and basic posture. We'll cover essential chords (C, G, D, Em, Am), strumming patterns, and fingerpicking techniques. By the end of the course, you'll be able to play 5-7 popular songs and understand basic music theory concepts. Each session includes personalized feedback and practice exercises.
prerequisites: No prior experience needed. Guitar required.

providerBio: IELTS certified instructor with 8 years of English teaching experience. Former British Council trainer.
description: Conversational English sessions to improve fluency, pronunciation, and confidence in communication.
detailedDescription: This interactive course focuses on practical spoken English for daily communication, professional settings, and social interactions. Through role-plays, discussions, and real-life scenarios, you'll overcome the fear of speaking English. We'll work on pronunciation, intonation, and accent reduction. Special emphasis on commonly mispronounced words and phrases used in Bangladesh. The course includes mock interviews, presentation practice, and group discussions.

providerBio: Full-stack developer with 7 years experience. MERN stack specialist and coding bootcamp instructor.
description: Learn the fundamentals of web programming through hands-on JavaScript projects and exercises.
detailedDescription: Start your programming journey with JavaScript, the language of the web. This course takes you from zero to building interactive web applications. We cover variables, data types, functions, DOM manipulation, and basic algorithms. You'll build 3 real projects: a calculator, a to-do list app, and a weather app. Perfect for beginners who want to start a career in web development or build their own websites.

providerBio: Certified yoga instructor with 6 years of teaching experience. Specialized in therapeutic and beginner yoga.
description: Morning yoga sessions focusing on posture, breathing, and relaxation techniques for beginners.
detailedDescription: This gentle introduction to yoga focuses on building a strong foundation for your practice. We'll start with basic poses (asanas), proper alignment, and breathing techniques (pranayama). Each session includes warm-up, asana practice, and relaxation. Special attention to posture correction and stress relief. Suitable for all ages and fitness levels. Modifications provided for different abilities.

providerBio: Award-winning photographer with 12 years experience. Published in National Geographic and Travel+Leisure.
description: Understand camera settings, composition, and lighting to take better photos with any camera.
detailedDescription: Learn to see the world through a photographer's eye. This course covers the technical aspects (aperture, shutter speed, ISO) and artistic elements (composition, lighting, storytelling). We'll work with both DSLR cameras and smartphone photography. Weekly photo assignments with personalized feedback. Field trips to practice different photography genres: portrait, landscape, street, and product photography.
duration: 8 weeks (1 session per week + field trip)
location: Mixed: Classroom + Outdoor locations in Sylhet
learningOutcomes: Work with natural and artificial light

providerBio: Certified nutritionist and chef with 8 years of culinary experience. Specialized in Bengali and healthy fusion cuisine.
description: Learn to cook delicious and healthy dishes with locally available ingredients and easy methods.
detailedDescription: Transform your kitchen into a healthy cooking haven! This course focuses on creating balanced, nutritious meals using locally sourced Bangladeshi ingredients. You'll learn meal planning, cooking techniques, and how to make traditional dishes healthier. We cover breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. Special sessions on diabetic-friendly, heart-healthy, and weight-management recipes. Perfect for busy individuals and families.
prerequisites: Basic kitchen equipment, passion for cooking

providerBio: Senior graphic designer with 10+ years in the industry. Worked with major brands like Unilever and Grameenphone.
description: A beginner-friendly introduction to design principles and tools like Canva and Adobe Photoshop.
detailedDescription: Unlock your creative potential with this comprehensive design course. Starting from zero, you'll learn color theory, typography, layout, and composition. We'll work with both Canva (for beginners) and Adobe Photoshop (for advanced users). You'll complete 5 real projects: logo design, social media graphics, business cards, flyers, and website mockups. Perfect for entrepreneurs, marketers, and creative professionals.

providerBio: Native French speaker with 5 years of language teaching experience. DELF certified instructor.
description: Learn essential French words and phrases for travel, greetings, and everyday interactions.
detailedDescription: Bonjour! Start your French journey with this practical course focused on travel and daily communication. You'll learn pronunciation, basic grammar, and essential vocabulary for restaurants, hotels, shopping, and transportation. Cultural insights about France and French-speaking countries included. Interactive sessions with role-plays, listening exercises, and conversation practice. Perfect for travelers, students, and culture enthusiasts.

providerBio: Digital marketing strategist with 9 years experience. Managed campaigns for Fortune 500 companies.
description: Hands-on introduction to SEO, social media strategies, and running effective online campaigns.
detailedDescription: Master the digital landscape with this comprehensive marketing course. Learn to create effective campaigns across SEO, social media, email marketing, and content creation. Practical exercises include keyword research, Facebook/Instagram ad creation, Google Analytics setup, and campaign optimization. Case studies from successful Bangladeshi businesses. Perfect for entrepreneurs, small business owners, and marketing professionals.
